locutie.beschrijving: The sermon explores the 'all-encompassing' nature of love in 1 Corinthians 13, arguing against the separation of Eros and Agape and defining God as the 'eroticization of the whole'.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: Theological-philosophical interpretation; less focused on the historical context of Corinth and more on a systematic-theological critique of dualism.

illocutie.beschrijving: The primary force is explaining a worldview and critiquing church tradition. It functions as a lecture on the philosophy of love.
voorbeelden: Ich verstehe das Christentum als eine Anleitung...
Die radikale Entgegensetzung von Eros und Agape ist einer der peinlichsten Züge...

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: Intellectual agreement, liberation from sexual shame, and a broader understanding of love.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Low; the Spirit is not explicitly invoked as the agent of this love.

voorbeelden: Die Trennung ist eine der Männererfindungen gewesen.
In Gott ist genau der Zustand des großen Alles.
Ich will nicht auf das ganze Hohelied eingehen.

commissieven.kwaliteit: Weak; the promise is an abstract eschatological hope rather than a concrete divine commitment to the hearer.

declaratieven.autoriteit: None; the preacher speaks as an observer/thinker, not as a mandatory of God.

constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes a student of a lecture rather than a recipient of a gift.

missende_elementen: Call to Action based on Grace
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Distance; the hearer is not addressed as a 'thou' by God.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: Non-existent; the text talks about the possibility of love but does not grant it.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Preacher's personal experience and opinions ('Ich verstehe', 'Ich kenne').

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Complete absence of direct address to the congregation.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: Assertive (Analysis of Eros/Agape) -> Assertive (Definition of God). It never reaches a Directive or Commissive.
voorbeelden: The entire text remains in the indicative mood.
foutief_patroon.probleem: It informs the mind but does not engage the will or the heart through a divine address.

voorbeelden_slechte_verhouding: The text ends with 'So soll es sein' without a preceding 'I give you the power to be'.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions as a theological essay. It prioritizes 'talking about' God and love over 'speaking for' God.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Ich habe mich kennengelernt als jemanden...

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It is an event of 'sharing thoughts', but not a 'sacramental event' where God acts on the hearer.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: God is treated as a concept (Vokabel) rather than a living subject who speaks.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: No; God is the object of reflection.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: No; the preacher speaks as an individual thinker.
tekstueel_bewijs: Das Wort GOTT ist eine Vokabel...

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Implicitly relies on human insight rather than the Spirit's work.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: No; it is a means of enlightenment.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by 'is' and 'means'. It needs 'give', 'promise', and 'forgive'.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: In Gott ist genau der Zustand des großen Alles.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Gott schenkt euch heute dieses große Alles.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from a definition to a gift.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The grace of 1 Cor 13 is described but not applied.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Use the 2nd person to promise God's love to the specific congregation.
voorbeeldzinnen: Diese Liebe, die alles hofft, gilt dir heute.

adressering_verbetering.probleem: The congregation is invisible in the text.
voorbeeldzinnen: Ihr seid befreit von der Trennung zwischen Eros und Agape.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The 'soll' (should) lacks a 'kann' (can) rooted in a promise.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Ground the 'all-encompassing love' in the declarative of God's love for the hearer.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The theological insights are profound, but for the sermon to become an 'event', the preacher must step out of the lecture hall and into the pulpit of proclamation.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the preacher's self-revelation; SAT reveals the lack of a creative divine act (Declarative).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: Rhetorically, it is a good essay; homiletically, it fails to perform the Word.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT identifies that the 'Constative Surplus' turns God into a 'Vokabel' instead of a Speaker.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: Das Wort GOTT ist eine Vokabel...
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: Weak; reduces the deity to linguistics.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of 'talking about' (constative) instead of 'doing' (performative).
